title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin looks at one NFC team that has Super Bowl aspirations this season and why that could be bad news for their young quarterback. He advocates for Russell Wilson and why people have mischaracterized his career with former head coach Pete Carroll. He also shares his first Herd Hierarchy ranking the top 10 NFL teams before the season kicks off. Plus, Nick Wright from First Things First joins the show to give his thoughts on Russell Wilson and what we should expect from the Cowboys this year. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
